snippet: Vatican experts and some church leaders said Pope Benedict XVI’s decision to quit could set limits for future popes and make them more subject to pressure from critics.
abstract: Resignation of Pope Benedict XVI will reverberate for years to come and could change nature of modern papacy, starting with election of his successor; Vatican experts and some church leaders say that Benedict’s decision holds potential to set limits for future popes, and make them more subject to pressure from critics.
lead_paragraph: Vatican experts and some church leaders said Pope Benedict XVI’s decision to quit could set limits for future popes and make them more subject to pressure from critics.

headline.seo: Benedict’s Decision May Affect Future Popes’ Terms
headline.main: In Benedict’s Resignation, the Potential to Place Limits on Future Popes
headline.print_headline: In Benedict’s Resignation, the Potential to Place Limits on Future Popes
